component.name: Pause Click plugin for VLC
component.summary: VLC plugin that allows to pause/play a video by clicking on the video image.

description.p:
Once installed, the plugin needs to be enabled using following steps:
Restart VLC (so that it loads the newly installed plugin)
Tick "Pause/Play video on mouse click" checkbox in Tools -> Preferences -> Show settings -> All -> Interface -> Control Interfaces
Tick "Pause/Play video on mouse click" checkbox in Tools -> Preferences -> Show settings -> All -> Video -> Filters
Restart VLC (so that it enables the plugin)
Both checkboxes need to be ticked for the plugin to function!
Plugin settings are available under Tools -> Preferences -> Show settings -> All -> Video -> Filters -> Pause click. The settings changes apply right away, there is no need to restart VLC.
